wikipedia_page.main: John Peter Michael Scawen Lytton, 5th Earl of Lytton, 18th Baron Wentworth,  (born 7 June 1950), styled Viscount Knebworth between 1951 and 1985, is a British chartered surveyor, peer, and member of the House of Lords.
